TopicTitle: [Bug] Cannot rename vessals in the Tracking Station

Articles.Content:
• KSP Version: v.0.1.1.0
  • Operating System and version: Windows 11
  • CPU and GPU models, any other system information which could be relevant
    • CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-10850K CPU @ 3.60GHz
    • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti
  • Description of the bug.  
    • Expected Behavior: When the vessal is renamed in Tracking station, the name should be changed.
    • Observed Behavior: The renamed vessals revert to original names.
  • Steps to Replicate: Go to Tracking Station after the vessal is in orbit
  • Fixes / Workarounds (if known..): Unknown
  • A list of ALL mods: None

I ran into this also, but instead of naming the vessel it renamed the planet it was orbiting around. For instance I had two vessels docked around Kerbin. I tried to rename it to Duna I. When I hit enter the name of the vessel stayed the same, but Kerbin was renamed to Duna I in the tracking station.

Can confirm. Same as v0.1.0.0

Still impossible to rename ships
